model.label: DC-Coupled Generator Status
model.description: Communicates details about the current behavior of a DC-coupled generator connected to an ESS
model.notes: Length of this model will be used as crude versioning technique for expected future additions

point.label: Generator Health
point.description: Indicates presence of any faults (alarms or warnings) that impact the generator's ability to run

symbol.label: Generator unknown/unset health state
symbol.description: This constant is defined to reserve the numeric default value as meaningless.

symbol.label: Generator ALARM health state
symbol.description: The generator has an alarm-level fault and cannot run (red)

symbol.label: Generator WARNING health state
symbol.description: The generator has a warning-level fault but can still run (yellow)

symbol.label: Generator READY health state
symbol.description: The generator has no active alarms or warnings and can run (green)

point.label: Generator Lifetime Run Hours
point.description: A running total of the number of hours for which the generator has run

point.label: Active E-Code
point.description: Contains the E-Code value for any currently-active fault (alarm or warning) on generator. If multiple faults are active, the E-Code for the highest-priority fault is reported.
point.notes: We will design a separate model to communicate the list of all active faults in the future, once software functionality requries it.

point.label: Energy In
point.description: Contains the lifetime total amount of energy consumed by the generator, in watt-hours.

point.label: Energy Out
point.description: Contains the lifetime total amount of energy produced by the generator, in watt-hours.

point.label: Generator Start/Stop Mode
point.description: The generator is designed to start automatically most of the time. This field reports if the generator is in auto mode or not.

symbol.label: Generator unknown/unset start/stop mode
symbol.description: This constant is defined to reserve the numeric default value as meaningless.

symbol.label: Generator IN_AUTO start/stop mode
symbol.description: The generator is ready to start if necessary to charge the ESS battery

symbol.label: Generator NOT_IN_AUTO start/stop mode
symbol.description: The generator will not start on its own when the ESS battery is in need of charging
